ncsa.hdf.view

Interface ImageView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataView
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultImageView

    public interface ImageView
extends DataView
    The image view interface for displaying image object
    Version:
    2.4 9/6/2007
    Author:
    Peter X. Cao
